txt.en: Talk to Einar outside of Gazat-fark
TBD - The Orc smiths must be stopped
You have defeated many Orc smiths.\n\nEinar, who is waiting outside of Gazat-fark, will be pleased to hear it.
DNT - Defeat Orc smiths at TBD
Einar believes that defeating the Orc smiths in Gazat-fark and Durb√°ngh could severely weaken Gorgar's forces.
DNT - Defeating the Orc smiths at TBD could severely weaken Gorgar's forces.

'Their craft can often be crude, but the Orcs are still capable of deadly creations. Underestimating their work could be a death sentence.\n\n'There are several Orc smiths working here -- defeat them, and perhaps we'll be able to breathe a little easier.'
The Orc smiths are hard at work creating weapons of war.
'Nicely done, my friend! No doubt the Orcs will find others among them to work the forges, but better to apply the pressure than just stand by and do nothing at all.'
